St. Paul. There seems to be relatively little support for it in the gospels. This might suggest that
it was not part of the original teaching of Jesus. But texts supporting the idea of Hell are easy to
find in the gospels.
**The  most  explicit  passage  I  know  on  the  question  of  the  proportion  of  the  saved  to  the
damned is Matthew 22:14, “Many are called, but few are chosen.” But if salvation depends on
acceptance of Jesus as one’s savior, as Christian exclus
